com.philips.lighting.hue.listener.PHLightListener

  • Packages that use PHLightListener 
    Package Description
    com.philips.lighting.model
    Representation of the Philips Hue Model objects.

    • Uses of PHLightListener in com.philips.lighting.model

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PHBridge.deleteLightWithId(java.lang.String lightIdentifier, PHLightListener listener)
      Deletes a Light from the bridge using the specified light identifier.
      void PHBridge.findNewLights(PHLightListener listener)
      Returns newly found lights around the bridge.
      void PHBridge.findNewLightsWithSerials(java.util.List<java.lang.String> serials, PHLightListener listener)
      Searches lights attached to the bridge with given serial numbers
      void PHBridge.updateLight(PHLight light, PHLightListener listener)
      Updates the light corresponding to identifier using the information in the new PHLight object.
      void PHBridge.updateLightState(PHLight light, PHLightState lightState, PHLightListener listener)
      Updates the LightState of the given light, and awaits a response from the bridge via the listener.
      void PHBridge.updateLightState(java.lang.String lightIdentifier, PHLightState lightState, PHLightListener listener)
      Sets the state of the light with the given identifier using the new light state.
